answers.answer: Do you have diabetes by any chance?Sounds like your circulation is off.You should really see a doctor to make sure it's nothing really serious.

question: at night difficult to be relaxed...also have brisaitus in hips....tingling and numbness on both feet, the right one is much worse and even goes into my hands a little. feeling off balanceThis discussion is related to/posts/Neurology/Right-Leg--foot-pain-and-numbness/show/1694125.
